author: BuXXe (@dieBuXXe)
title: bs.to
synopsis: Movian plugin to watch bs.to streams
description: bs.to Movian plugin allows the integration of bs.to streams into Movian. bs.to offers a broad variety of german / english tv-series. If you encounter problems, leave a note at the github. Visit at: https://github.com/BuXXe/movian-bs-plugin
